A

addBricks(int, int, int) - Method in class FunctionLayer.Bricks
This method sums the amount of bricks needed for a layer of the lego house to the previous calculated layers.
addDoorAndWindow() - Method in class FunctionLayer.Bricks
This methods is used when holes for a door and a window is applied to the house.

B

BrickCalculator - Class in FunctionLayer
The purpose of BrickCalculater is to do the calculation needed when the customer wants to see which bricks is needed for a specific house to be constructed.
BrickCalculator() - Constructor for class FunctionLayer.BrickCalculator
 
Bricks - Class in FunctionLayer
The purpose of Bricks is to store information about how many bricks is needed to build a certain Lego house and if this house has holes for a door and a window.
Bricks() - Constructor for class FunctionLayer.Bricks

calcFromDimensions(int, int, int) - Method in class FunctionLayer.BrickCalculator
